description: Java source file defining the WebConfig class for configuring CORS and OpenAPI metadata in a Spring Boot application.

classes.name: WebConfig
classes.description: Configuration class for setting up CORS policies and OpenAPI documentation details.

methods.name: corsConfigurer
methods.description: Defines a WebMvcConfigurer bean that configures permissive CORS mappings for all routes.

methods.name: customOpenAPI
methods.description: Defines an OpenAPI bean that sets API metadata such as title, version, and description.
